title: Taylor Polynomial with Table part - a

content.question: Write the first-degree Taylor polynomial for h about x = 2 and use it to approximate h(1.9). Is this approximation greater than h(1.9) ? Explain your reasoning.

frqParts.text: Write the first-degree Taylor polynomial for h about x = 2 and use it to approximate h(1.9). Is this approximation greater than h(1.9) ? Explain your reasoning.

topic.text: 4.6: Approximating Values of a Function Using Local Linearity and Linearization

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
